entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Banff
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:16 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 01:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
